item.title: Extracting Reddit Data with AI
item.description: A few days ago, I stumbled upon a Reddit thread packed with API recommendations. The thread was long, detailed, and exactly what I neededâ€”except I didn’t want to manually comb through dozens of comments. I figured this was the perfect job for AI. Spoiler alert: it wasn’t as straightforward as I expected.
